医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员展示了肿瘤微环境中的通信网络如何促进癌症生长肿瘤由直接环境中实际的恶性癌细胞和健康的未转化细胞组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-show-how-communication-networks-in-the-tumor-microenvironment-promote-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-show-how-communication-networks-in-the-tumor-microenvironment-promote-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2e787c4-ee7e-477c-b8dd-22a7db20dfe7 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 07:22:39 -0400 Researchers show how communication networks in the tumor microenvironment promote cancer growth
Spectrum CE 系统：适用于法医实验室工作流程的毛细管电泳仪器在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 Ben Krenke 讨论了用于法医实验室工作流程的 Spectrum CE 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/The-Spectrum-CE-System-A-capillary- electrophoresis-instrument-for-the-forensic-laboratory-workflow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/The-Spectrum-CE-System-A-capillary- electrophoresis-instrument-for-the-forensic-laboratory-workflow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97c41e7c-11de-4657-906b-8942a0907141 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 06:41:00 -0400 The Spectrum CE System: A capillary electrophoresis instrument for the forensic laboratory workflow
Medi-Cal 分散的系统可能使搬家成为一场噩梦去年，当劳埃德·坦尼森 (Lloyd Tennison) 从核桃溪搬到斯托克顿时，他认为他在加州医疗保险计划 (Medi-Cal) 下的保险范围将无缝转移。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Medi-Cale28099s-fragmented-system-can-make-moving-a-nightmare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Medi-Cale28099s-fragmented-system-can-make-moving-a-nightmare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=048d7345-0901-42e9-ac41-4d73f265ab39 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 06:38:34 -0400 Medi-Cal’s fragmented system can make moving a nightmare
随着美国孕产妇死亡率激增，爱达荷州撤销了调查妊娠相关死亡的小组7 月 1 日，爱达荷州成为唯一没有法律要求或专门委员会审查与怀孕相关的孕产妇死亡的州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Idaho-drops-panel-investigating-pregnancy-lated-deaths-as-US-maternal-mortality-surges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Idaho-drops-panel-investigating-pregnancy-lated-deaths-as-US-maternal-mortality-surges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7b16a43-30f6-4be5-ab87-682899777199 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 06:37:28 -0400 Idaho drops panel investigating pregnancy-related deaths as US maternal mortality surges
加州承诺为数千名出狱囚犯提供更好的照顾加州已同意改善新出狱的残疾囚犯的医疗保健，其中包括采取一系列措施，倡导者称这些措施将帮助几乎所有试图从监禁中过渡的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/California-promises-better-care-for-thousands-of-inmates-as-they-leave-prison.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/California-promises-better-care-for-thousands-of-inmates-as-they-leave-prison.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c3a59d4-7ab6-4e2a-b84c-cb5c5a87ab0b Fri, 07 Jul 2023 06:36:20 -0400 California promises better care for thousands of inmates as they leave prison
“这是一场大屠杀”：罕见的透析并发症可以致命，但可以采取更多措施来阻止它尼尔杰·格德尼 (Nieltje Gedney) 在西弗吉尼亚州的家中半睡半醒，在床边血液透析机的嗡嗡声中观看谋杀之谜，这时她感到腋窝里有东西温暖湿润。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/e28098It-was-a-bloodbathe28099-Rare-diaanalysis-complication-can-kill-and-more-could-be-done-to-stop-it。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/e28098It-was-a-bloodbathe28099-Rare-diaanalysis-complication-can-kill-and-more-could-be-done-to-stop-it。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f92505d2-e56c-4a83-ac28-98047f50585d Fri, 07 Jul 2023 06:33:44 -0400 ‘It was a bloodbath’: Rare dialysis complication can kill, and more could be done to stop it
调查破坏：粗心和不专心的参与者歪曲了 COVID-19 的清洁习惯调查是收集公共卫生数据的最常见方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Survey-sabotage-careless-and-inattentive-participants-misrepresent-COVID-19-cleaning-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Survey-sabotage-careless-and-inattentive-participants-misrepresent-COVID-19-cleaning-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46a5304f-9402-4474-9103-171cb01568d1 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 04:40:00 -0400 Survey sabotage: careless and inattentive participants misrepresent COVID-19 cleaning habits
量子医学：前进的道路？研究探讨了量子物理学如何为医学做出贡献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Quantum-medicine-the-way-forward.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Quantum-medicine-the-way-forward.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc8cb29-1862-4951-80d8-665bcaf34457 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 04:00:00 -0400 Quantum medicine: the way forward?
新的人工智能系统可能彻底改变瓣膜性心脏病的诊断AI（人工智能）听起来像是一个冰冷的机器人系统，但大阪都立大学的科学家们已经证明，它可以提供温暖人心的支持，或者更确切地说，“心脏警告”支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-AI-system-could-revolutionize-the-diagnosis-of-valvular-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-AI-system-could-revolutionize-the-diagnosis-of-valvular-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af41d6ec-0037-442c-9d02-48e02f099e5c Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:16:00 -0400 New AI system could revolutionize the diagnosis of valvular heart disease
免疫疗法显着提高晚期 NSCLC 患者的总生存率由 UCL 和 UCLH 领导并由罗氏赞助的一项全球研究表明，癌症免疫疗法 atezolizumab 显着改善了无法接受含铂化疗的晚期非小细胞肺癌患者的总体生存率，当与单药化疗相比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Immunotherapy-significantly-improves-overall-survival-for-advanced-NSCLC-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Immunotherapy-significantly-improves-overall-survival-for-advanced-NSCLC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8275b44b-9a6e-4e83-8256-c1e172929788 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:13:00 -0400 Immunotherapy significantly improves overall survival for advanced NSCLC patients
